scripts.upgrade: npm run upgrade:spa && npm run upgrade:modules && npm run postinstall && npm run build
scripts.upgrade:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && ncu -u'
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:spa && npm run install:modules
scripts.install:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && npm i'
scripts.build: npm run build:spa && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: ls -1 modules | xargs -r -I {} bash -c 'cd modules/{} && npm run build'
